item.description: How to subset fonts: # in a virtualenv pip install fonttools brotli zopfli pyftsubset --help see: https://fonttools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/subset/index.html#initial-glyph-set-specification https://markoskon.com/creating-font-subsets/#available-tools https://clagnut.com/blog/2418/ https://wakamaifondue.com/beta/ Also, optical-sized variable fonts look great.

Typographic Units Absolute distance Name CSS Unit length Picas pc 1/6 inch Points pt 1/72 inches – https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/CSS/Building_blocks/Values_and_units#absolute_length_units Font-relative units em: In metal type, the point size (and hence the em, from em quadrat) was equal to the line height of the metal body from which the letter rises. […] In some older texts, but not all, the em is defined, or said to have been defined, as the width of the capital ‘M’ in the current typeface and point size.
